name: inexpressibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is too strong to be described: The jokes were inexpressibly awful. She suddenly felt inexpressibly weary. See
inexpressible
More examplesFewer examplesIt was inexpressibly refreshing to hear a man be himself in a political speech. The landscape at its best is inexpressibly lovely.I feel inexpressibly privileged to be a guest here.
